Lyric:
[by:mybones]
[0-1:59.700][Intro] " When it comes to drugs,
[00:01.600]pill-pushers and takers,
[00:03.950]we are a country virtually out of control.
[00:08.420]If you're feeling depressed, to get relief, take a pill.
[00:14.250]Most of us are addicts. "
[00:17.350][Verse 1: Lil Peep] Life gets hard sometimes, I know
[00:21.380]So I be leaning, I be smoking my dope
[00:25.220]I see your face everywhere that I go
[00:29.340]It's the only thing that remind me of home
[00:32.870]I be with my team racing whips on the road
[00:37.310]Rollin' off a bean that I took at the show
[00:41.230]Young limousine, I'm a backseat rider
[00:44.940]She only call my phone when she think that I'm dying
[00:48.830]Baby, you're the one for me, that's fo' sho'
[00:53.220]I just need your company, so ride slow
[00:56.850]This ain't what you want from me, I'm so cold
[01:00.850]You're the only one for me I know
[01:04.480][Hook: Cold Hart] You're the only one that I love
[01:07.560]And I can't name one person I trust
[01:11.400]If you want one, then I'll find myself
[01:15.400]If you're leaving, then I'll go with you
[01:19.420]You're the only one that I love
[01:23.500]And I can't name one person I trust
[01:27.520]If you want one, then I'll find myself
[01:31.410]If you're leaving, then I'll leave with you
[01:38.960]I'll leave with you
[01:42.900]I'll leave with you, I'll leave with you
[01:46.980]Cold Hart, baby, Gothboiclique
[01:51.730][Verse 2: Cold Hart] Yeah she asking me, "What are we? "
[01:54.710]I'm like, " What you mean? "
[01:55.840]
[01:57.170]I'm smoking gasoline with my team
[01:59.810]GBC, they'll be there with me
[02:03.330]And I know I ain't Suge, but you Master Piece
[02:07.830]Kurt Cobain jeans, you my Courtney Love
[02:11.870]Thraxxl Rose how I got the club going up
[02:15.430]Taking bars for anxiety
[02:19.870]Smoking kush is my therapy
[02:23.790][Hook: Cold Hart] You're the only one that I love
[02:27.420]And I can't name one person I trust
[02:31.410]If you want one, then I'll find myself
[02:35.720]If you're leaving, then I'll go with you
[02:39.250]You're the only one that I love
[02:43.430]And I can't name one person I trust
[02:47.660]If you want one, then I'll find myself
[02:51.370]If you're leaving, then I'll leave with you
[02:57.720]I'll leave with you
[03:13.210][Outro] " A lot of people have seen their friends die.
[03:16.370]I don't want anyone to see any of their friends die anymore. "
